data.title: Jayam Kondaan (2008)
data.meta_description: The film revolves around an Information technology professional, who returns to Chennai from London, to set up his own business. Follows the sibling relationship and the threat from the rowdy.
data.text:
Do y'll Remember your First Movie in Theatre ?

Amma Used to tell me that , Vijaykanth's Ramana Was my First Theatrical watch , I was a Kai Kulanthai then , So i don't have any Glitches of me watching Ramana in Theatre except in KTV .

So , To my Knowledge , My Proper First Theatrical experience happened in 2007 , It was Unnale Unnale . Vinay was the first Hero i witnessed in the Big Screen. From then he gave me chills everytime by Appearing in my TV ( Sun Music) singing June Ponal July Katre ( sorry I Used to believe that , Hero will actually sing ) .

Then Days Went , I watched Sivaji ,â€¦
